reference.text: wigs, toupees, or the like A41G3/00, A41G5/00; hairdressers` chairs A47C1/04; hair cutting appliances, razors B26B

note.note-paragraph: The following IPC groups are not used not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by this group is classified in the corresponding CPC groups as it follows: - A45D97/00 covered by A45D44/00

title-part.text: Curling-tongs, i.e. tongs for use when hot
Curling-irons, i.e. irons for use when hot
with means for internal heating, e.g. by liquid fuel
the jaws remaining parallel to each other during use, e.g. the jaws sliding parallel to each other
the jaws being separable from each other
External heating means for curling-tongs or curling-irons
with temperature regulating or indicating means
